Patient.title: Patient
Patient.description: Represents a patient with their medical history, care plans, and emergency contacts.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Patient entity.

firstName.description: The first name of the patient.

lastName.description: The last name of the patient.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the patient.

medicalHistory.description: A summary of the patient's medical history.

carePlan.description: Details of the patient's care plan.

emergencyContactPhone.description: Phone number of the emergency contact.

DailyRecord.title: DailyRecord
DailyRecord.description: Represents a daily record of activities, medication administration, and observations for a patient.

id.description: Unique identifier for the DailyRecord entity.

Staff.title: Staff
Staff.description: Represents a staff member with their profile, schedule, and role information.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Staff entity. This is the same as the user's auth UID.

name.description: The full name of the staff member.

email.description: The email of the staff member.

phone.description: The phone number of the staff member.

role.description: The role of the staff member (e.g., nurse, doctor).

schedule.description: The schedule of the staff member.

certifications.description: List of certifications held by the staff member.

status.description: The status of the staff account.

assignedPatients.description: List of patient IDs assigned to this staff member.

SleepLog.title: SleepLog
SleepLog.description: Represents a daily sleep log for a patient, tracking hourly status.

id.description: Unique identifier for the SleepLog entity.

log_date.description: The date of the sleep log.

hours.description: An array representing the sleep status for each of the 24 hours in a day.

notes.description: Additional notes about the patient's sleep.

definition.description: Stores basic user profile information and role.
Stores daily records for a specific patient.
Stores sleep logs for a specific patient.
Stores staff profiles. The staffId is the same as the user's auth UID.
